backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing access control, user approvals, and registration for client, partner, internal, and superadmin roles with ID generation and permission checks.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report stub with no listed features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the function and routing behavior of each frontend page component.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS config defining color variables, theme layers, and dark mode tokens.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML shell that mounts the React app and loads main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Custom manual router using window history to load landing, auth pages, dashboards, and fallback 404 component.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and caches a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider for Internet Identity authentication handling login, stored identities, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder React Query hook for a future canCreateTaskUI backend method.
frontend/src/index.css: Duplicate Tailwind CSS theme variables and base styles matching frontend/index.css.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/_shared/PageShell.tsx: Layout wrapper providing centered content area and a footer.
frontend/src/pages/client/ClientLogin.ts: Client login UI with disabled authentication buttons and navigation links.
frontend/src/pages/client/ClientRegister: Client registration form UI with disabled submit button and basic fields.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/AdminDashb: Admin dashboard displaying a static message with a disabled logout button.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/AsistenmuD: Assistant dashboard showing a thank‑you message and disabled logout button.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/ClientDash: Client dashboard that checks task creation permission and enables a task button accordingly.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/ConciergeD: Concierge dashboard showing a static appreciation message with disabled logout.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/FinanceDas: Finance dashboard with a static system message and disabled logout.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/PartnerDas: Partner dashboard showing a growth‑focused message and disabled logout.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/Superadmin: Superadmin dashboard handling identity state, logout, and displaying actor fetch status.
External client login flow using Internet Identity and actor checks before redirecting to dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/external/ClientRegist: Client registration page handling Internet Identity login, form validation, and submitting a client profile via actor API.
frontend/src/pages/external/PartnerLogin: Partner login page supporting Internet Identity authentication and redirecting users to registration or dashboard based on role.
frontend/src/pages/external/PartnerRegis: Partner registration page managing II login, form input, and submitting a partner profile to the backend.
frontend/src/pages/internal/InternalLand: Simple landing page linking to internal login and registration pages.
frontend/src/pages/internal/InternalLogi: Internal login page handling II auth, role extraction, superadmin claim checks, and dashboard routing.
frontend/src/pages/internal/InternalRegi: Internal user registration form allowing II login and submission of internal roles and profile info via actor API.
frontend/src/pages/Landing.tsx: Landing page offering client and partner login/registration options plus internal link.
Static partner login UI with disabled actions and links to partner registration.
frontend/src/pages/partner/PartnerRegist: Renders a partner registration form with fields for personal info, skills, and a disabled submit button inside a styled PageShell.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities to read, persist, and clear URL parameters with sessionStorage fallback and hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with extended color tokens, container settings, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, backend scope rules, architectural notes, and known issues for the current build state.
